Capability.description: This type describes a capability of a collection for a specific use case.
Capability.longDescription: This type shall describe a capability of a Resource Collection in terms of how a client can create Resources within the collection for the specified use case.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CapabilitiesObject.description: The link to the Resource the client may GET to understand how to form a POST request for a collection.
CapabilitiesObject.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource that matches the type for a Resource Collection and shall contain annotations that describe the properties allowed in the POST request.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described Links Property shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

UseCase.description: The use case in which a client may issue a POST request to the collection.
UseCase.longDescription: This property shall contain an enumerated value that describes the use case for this capability instance.

CollectionCapabilities.description: This type describes the capabilities of a collection.
CollectionCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall describe any capabilities of a Resource Collection in terms of how a client can create Resources within the Resource Collection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Capabilities.description: The list of capabilities supported by this Resource.
Capabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of Capability structures.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RelatedItem.description: The ID(s) of the Resources associated with this capability.
RelatedItem.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of IDs for pointers consistent with JSON Pointer syntax to the Resource that is related to this capability.

TargetCollection.description: Reference to the collection that this capabilities structure is describing.
TargetCollection.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection that this structure describes.  A client may use this structure to understand how to form the POST request for the collection.

enumDescriptions.ComputerSystemComposition: This capability describes a client creating a new ComputerSystem instance from a set of disaggregated hardware.
enumDescriptions.ComputerSystemConstrainedComposition: This capability describes a client creating a new ComputerSystem instance from a set of constraints.
enumDescriptions.VolumeCreation: This capability describes a client creating a new Volume instance as part of an existing storage subsystem.
